detail.reviewExistsTeaserTitle: You have already commented this blog post!
detail.reviewExistsTeaserText: Would you like to edit your comment?
detail.reviewLanguageFilterLabel: Display comments in current language only.
detail.reviewLoginDescription: Comments can only be submitted while being logged in. Please enter your login details below.
detail.reviewFormSuccessAlert: Thank you for submitting your comment. We will examine the comment and eventually unlock it, please be patient.
detail.reviewFormSuccessUpdateAlert: Thank you for editing your comment. Changes will be visible as soon as we have unlocked them.
detail.reviewFormErrorAlert: An error occurred. Please make sure you filled in all fields correctly.
detail.reviewNotPublicYetAlert: Your comment has not been approved yet
detail.reviewListEmpty: No comments found. Share your opinion with others.
